body.p: Two of our volunteers will run a booth to promote Free Software at COSCUP, the Conference for Open Source Coders, Users & Promoters. They will both also give a talks about "REUSE - Making Licensing Easy for Everyone", "On corporate control of Free Software Projectsâ€¦ systemic community lessons from IBM & Red Hat", and "Free and Open Source Licensing Basics for Developers". If you have the time, feel free to stop by and say hello to Simon and Florian; they will be happy to talk to you and answer any questions you might have.
